resources.string:
Navigating the Main Screen:
 
To access the list of properties, click the map icon in the upper right. 
To learn more about the Greater Worcester Land Trust, click the information icon to visit their website. 

Navigating the Property Screen:
 
To see more information about the property, click the "See More" button. This includes sightings reported by other users. 
To report either a sighting or a problem, click the "Report" button. You will then be prompted to choose between a sighting and a problem, and the app will then transfer to the report screen. 

Navigating the Report Screen:
 
The report screen will tell you the property you are reporting on and the type of report (sighting or problem). 
If you selected the problem report type, you can fill in the checkboxes which are for common problems on properties. 
For either type of report, you can fill in a text box with more details on the report. 
You will then be prompted to choose an email client to send the report. 
Once you have selected the email client, an email with the data you filled in on the report screen in addition to a subject and recipients will be generated.

The following items are common problems with our trails and you can choose whichever are applicable and add additional information in the field below them. Once you are finished, an email will be generated for you that will be sent to the Greater Worcester Land Trust.
Please add anything you saw or wish to tell the Greater Worcester Land Trust on your visit to this property. This information will be used to improve the "see more" section for this property.
